channel.description:
Transgender woman artist living and working in Turku, Finland
Website: rubylouiserose.com Bluesky: @rubylouiserose.bsky.social Instagram: @rubylouiserose
Made with Simon Repp's Faircamp
channel.title: Ruby Louise Rose

item.description: Extratone studies for gabber kicks, hoover, First Choice and Julie.

item.description: Extratone studies for gabber kicks, hoover and Gunnery Sergeant Hartman.
item.title: Stephen Christopher Stamper – Sucker Variations

item.description: Extratone studies for gabber kicks, hoover and pitch-shifted voice.
item.title: Ruby Louise Rose – Vocal Feminisation Techniques

item.description: Sweaty gay porn, acid house and electro!
item.title: Pattern Recognition – My Hole

item.description:
The sound of the Korg Monotron Delay’s PT2399 echo processor chip and MS-20-based low-pass filter caught in an ever-evolving feedback loop.
Released March 17, 2022 by Hard Return, a label for repetitive/persistent music.
item.title: A Companion of Owls – Ouroboros

item.description:
Recorded live @ SOUNDESTzine Launch Party, Oranssi, Helsinki, 03.10.2018, on a bill including Petri Kuljuntausta, Petteri Mäkiniemi, Eva Macali, Jukka Kääriäinen/Teemu Mustonen, Luke Lund, Kenneth Kovasin and Sourya Sen.
Organised by Ava Imogen Grayson.
item.title: Stephen Christopher Stamper – Live @ SOUNDESTzine Launch Party

item.description: My contribution to Runningonair's More Than Machine Remixes compilation.
item.title: Stephen Christopher Stamper – Rave Tape Amnesia

item.description:
Recorded live @ Archaeology, The Railway, Winchester, 19.04.2014, on a bill including Howlround, Kemper Norton, Olan Mill and Clive Henry.
Organised by Ologies: Joe Evans from Runningonair Music and Matt Poacher from Mountain*7.
item.title: Stephen Christopher Stamper – Live @ Archaeology

item.description:
Review by Marc Weidenbaum at Disquiet.com:
There are sharply plucked guitar strings and a combination of echoes - glitchy snaps, high-pitched synthesised tones, occasionally with a touch of Morse code to them, and the guitar itself playing a complementary line. This is the elegant “Sketch for Electric Guitar, Laptop & Electromagnetic Interference” by A Companion of Owls, aka Stephen Stamper of Helsinki, Finland. In a brief accompanying note he explains in slightly greater detail than the track’s title: “Sketch for single coil pickup electric guitar, monophonic pitch tracking sine wave oscillator, three randomly reversible audio buffers and electromagnetic interference.” The real beauty in the piece may be the pauses, the waiting, the time during which something is held before something else appears - it adds drama, intensity, and narrative to sounds that are quite simple unto themselves.
item.title: A Companion of Owls – Sketches for Electric Guitar and Laptop

item.description:
Sketches for (plus a live recording of) a performance at Aural Ataraxia, Akusmata, Helsinki, 17.09.2016, on a bill including Wellenform and bin.exe.
Organised by Kenneth Kovasin of [ówt krì].
item.title: A Companion of Owls – Sketches for Aural Ataraxia

item.description:
Recorded live at The Big Sleep, Oranssi, Helsinki, 25/01/2020, on a bill including S/N Measures, Sasha & Mia, ollijohanna and COLDSORE.
Organised by Terranean Recordings/Luke Lund.
item.title: A Companion of Owls – Live @ The Big Sleep

item.description:
Demos for a post-punk/punk-funk/disco EP that I WILL finish one day…
Guitar, bass and machines by Ruby Louise Rose. Vocal on "…but you're still an asshole!" by Ian MacKaye.
item.title: Futura 2200 – Dust-Cleaner

item.description: Visit rubylouiserose.com for a detailed description of each piece.
